title: Taiwan Issues Land Warning, Cancels Work as Typhoon Dujuan Nears
content:
Sep 27, 2015 
 
(Bloomberg) -- Taiwan issued a land warning and canceled work and classes in northern regions as Typhoon Dujuan approached from the east.
                      Taipei City, New Taipei City, Keelung City and Taoyuan City met the criteria for shutdowns on Monday, which is already a public holiday for the Mid-Autumn Festival. Dujuan was centered 410 kilometers (255 miles) east-southeast of Hualien on  …
